channel.title: CiTR -- Shameless
channel.description: An eclectic mix of music, sound bites, information and inanity.
channel.itunes:summary: An eclectic mix of music, sound bites, information and inanity.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Jun-2012
item.itunes:subtitle: Jonathon's Final Shameless - featuring interviews with Mount Eerie and Alex Flock!

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Jun-2012
item.description: Vancouver's Ape War is the definition of classic hardcore punk.
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with APE WAR!

item.title: Broadcast on 30-May-2012
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Facts & Music Paste.

item.title: Broadcast on 16-May-2012
item.description: Toronto-based indie singer-songwriter Jim Guthrie joins us to talk about making music for video games, as well as a solo-career making music, plus his time with Islands.
item.itunes:subtitle: A look at video game music with Jim Guthrie

item.title: Broadcast on 02-May-2012
item.description: Lots of new music to the library, and bands with gigs around town!
item.itunes:subtitle: Poor Young Things

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Apr-2012
item.description: Miranda Nelson of straight.com has a chat with yours truly in the deep, dark boothes of Vancouver's best-kept secret, Kyle's Cafe.
item.itunes:subtitle: An evening with Miranda Nelson of the Georgia Straight, at Kyle's Cafe

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Apr-2012
item.description: Part 2 With Victor Lucas, and another round with Shaun Hatton, both of the Electric Playground and Reviews on the Run!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Fan Expo Experience!

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Mar-2012
item.description: Local singer/songwriter Bonn Smith comes to the studio to perform a few live acoustic songs, and I chat with Victor Lucas of EP Daily and Reviews on the Run.
item.itunes:subtitle: Bonn Smith performs live, and Part 1 with Victor Lucas

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Mar-2012
item.description: Featured on tonight's show, interviews with Young Liars, the Pack A.D., Samantha Savage Smith, and Young Pacific.
item.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with Four Geeat Bands

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Feb-2012
item.description: We chat with indie pop singer from Toronto, Darrelle London, and Ank Kundi returns with another edition of WTF: The Wacky Things Files.
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Darrelle London!

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Jan-2012
item.description: Interview with Ross and Randy of Ordinary Lies
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Ordinary Lies

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Jan-2012
item.description: We delve into Vancouver singer/songwriter Jodi Doidge's debut EP "Little Love Songs" track by track, while Ank Kundi enlightens us to some oddities around the world.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jodi Doidge Returns, as does The Wacky Things Files with Ank Kundi!

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Dec-2011
item.description: Once again, we unwrap some classic and new holiday-spirited songs while the yule log keeps us warm.
item.itunes:subtitle: Festive Special with Matt Pollock

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Dec-2011
item.description: One of the greatest, no, THE greatest ska band of all time, Fishbone!
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Norwood Fisher of Fishbone.

item.title: Broadcast on 16-Nov-2011
item.description: A Chat with Vancouver indie pop chaunteuse Sarah Jinklking of The Oh Wells.
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with The Oh Wells!

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Nov-2011
item.description: Interview with Hooded Fang on their cross-country tour, and with the Honky-Tonk Kid after his guitar-on-a-pole match!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Pro-Wrestling tribute with Hooded Fang and the Honky-Tonk Kid.

item.title: Broadcast on 19-Oct-2011
item.description: They're made up of other musicians from around town, but to call them a supergroup would inflate their egos!
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Pleasure Cruise

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Sep-2011
item.description: Snakes, Panthers, and Supaflies, oh my!
item.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with Shaky Snakes and Panther and the Supafly.

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Sep-2011
item.description: A great new-ish band that got ahold of me is Self Sufficient. They produce everything you hear from their own home ... aside from the odd live track.
item.itunes:subtitle: A tribute to DIY with Self Sufficient.

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Aug-2011
item.description: Featuring interviews with Shaun Hatton of COBRA (as well as The Electric Playground and Reviews on the Run), Toronto MC More or Les, and a live performance in the studio with Heatwave and the Vendettas. I'm also joined by my old pal Dead Mike!
item.itunes:subtitle: Shameless #100

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Aug-2011
item.description: Now's a good time for music in Vancouver! Three great bands come by the studio this time around.
item.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with Jason and the Diatonics, Diamond Dancer, and Olenka and the Autumn Lovers.

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Jul-2011
item.description: A continuation of the last episode.
item.itunes:subtitle: The SSRI's perform live at the Anza Club, and we delve further into the minds of Sun Wizard

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Jul-2011
item.description: On this jam-packed edition, Jodi Doidge performs live, and I also chat with Shotgun Jimmie and Sun Wizard, but not at the same time. Also, Natalee makes a vegan double-down aka the double-up(tm).
item.itunes:subtitle: How to make a Vegan Double-Down, also Interviews with Jodi Doidge, Shotgun Jimmie, and Sun Wizard.

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Jun-2011
item.description: I met them when they came in to the music scene here in Vancouver, and I get to see them off back to the East Coast!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Return, and Exit of Diamond Dust.

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Jun-2011
item.description: Also, Natalee reads a heart-warming tale!
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Portage and Main.

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Jun-2011
item.description: A whole-show decked out with bands playing the Music Waste festival and an interview with the B-Lines.
item.itunes:subtitle: A Music Waste Special with The B-Lines

item.title: Broadcast on 18-May-2011
item.description: Features an interview with NY electronic rock duo Phantogram, and the world premiere of "Robover the Top"
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Phantogram.

item.title: Broadcast on 04-May-2011
item.description: Tyler Bancroft of Said the Whale and Lana Gay of Radio 3's "Lanarama" and 99.3 The Fox's "Indie Night in Canada" offer up some grand conversation!
item.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with Said the Whale and Lana Gay.

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Apr-2011
item.description: Half the time, I shoot from the hip, the other half ... I shoot to the hip!
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Sandman Viper Command

item.title: Broadcast on 23-Mar-2011
item.description: I'd say "don't call it a clip show", but it really is.
item.itunes:subtitle: The 10th Anniversary Retrospective

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Mar-2011
item.description: Jim Bryson of Jim Bryson & The Weakerthans, and Phil with Steve from Philoceraptor join myself & Matt of the dirtfarm in the studio.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jim Bryson & Philoceraptor

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Feb-2011
item.description: ... to talk all things Zombie Prom, as part of Run With the Heard!
item.itunes:subtitle: Kevvy Mental returns...

item.title: Broadcast on 26-Jan-2011
item.description:
Not to be confused with the Kurasawa movie of the same name.
Also, we debut a new segment - conspiracy theories with Ank Kundi!
item.itunes:subtitle: A tribute to hip-hop with Hidden Fortress.

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Jan-2011
item.description: She's writing and recording one song a day!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Time-Capsule with Crystal Dorval of My Friend Wallis.

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Dec-2010
item.description: Featuring interviews with the likes of: The Cancerbats, Autolux, Comeback Kid, Brasstronaut, Fred Penner, Arkells, Gino Vanelli, live performances, and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Best of 2010 Retrospective.

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Dec-2010
item.description: of dirtfarm.tumblr.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Holiday Special with Matt Pollock

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Dec-2010
item.description: If anyone does this country proud abroad, it's Gino Vannelli. He's returned to his homeland to promote his latest album, a re-recording of his greatest hits!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Very Special Interview with Gino Vannelli

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Nov-2010
item.description: Instead of taking the night off to study ... I decided to study on the air! Crystal Swells came by to help.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Study-Hall Edition with Crystal Swells

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Oct-2010
item.description: Kaboom Atomic, underground Hip-Hop emcee and member of music ensemble Run With the Heard joins us on the eve of their Hallowe'en themed-show "Premature Ejackulantern" and his own solo show on this mostly-rappin' special!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Return of Kaboom Atomic

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Oct-2010
item.description: Three great bands from the east, all powerful storytellers in their own fashions.
item.itunes:subtitle: An Acoustic Special with an in-show performance from The Wooden Sky, plus interviews with The Arkells, & The Stanfields!

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Sep-2010
item.description: Over the course of four days, the city of Vancouver is alive with indie music at as many venues as physically possible. We chat with three of the members of Vancouver electronic band Dbl Dragon about partying hard, and loving ... soft?
item.itunes:subtitle: An Olio Festival Tribute with Dbl Dragon.

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Sep-2010
item.description: Features interviews with Andrew Neufeld of Comeback Kid, as well as a live performance with Eirene Cloma and another live set from Autumn Portrait.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Back-to-School special with Eirene Cloma, Comeback Kid, and Autumn Portrait.

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Aug-2010
item.itunes:subtitle: Death of Summer Special with Like Animals Again

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Aug-2010
item.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with Autolux and (briefly) with the Clockmakers!

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Jul-2010
item.itunes:subtitle: Leif Vollebekk performs live on the air and the Seven, Nines and Tens return with a new lineup!

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Jul-2010
item.itunes:subtitle: Andrew Candela from Plus Perfect Co-hosts!

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Jul-2010
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with We Were Lovers

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Jun-2010
item.description: Who better to do a cross-Canadian show, in music, than with a man who makes a living at crossing the country himself!
item.itunes:subtitle: The 3rd Cross-Canada Venture, with Tim Van Horne of the Canadian Mosaic Project!

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Jun-2010
item.description: Quite possibly the menagerie to end all Shameless menageries.
item.itunes:subtitle: A Tribute to Festivals with Jody Glenham, Natalee's Wedding Playlist, and Animal ER episode 4!

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Jun-2010
item.description: Quite possibly the menagerie to end all Shameless menageries.
item.itunes:subtitle: A Tribute to Festivals with Jody Glenham, Natalee's Wedding Playlist, and Animal ER episode 4!

item.title: Broadcast on 30-May-2010
item.description: Half Chinese stops by to help shill for the great annual Music Waste festival!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Music Waste Special with Half Chinese

item.title: Broadcast on 16-May-2010
item.description: Phoner with City Sirens & The Get Down!
item.itunes:subtitle: Phoner with City Sirens & The Get Down!

item.title: Broadcast on 02-May-2010
item.description: We chat with Tariq Hussain of CBC Radio 3 / Brasstronaut fame.
item.itunes:subtitle: An afternoon with Tariq Hussain.

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Apr-2010
item.description: The Spring-Cleaning Edition with Colin Moore!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Spring-Cleaning Edition with Colin Moore!

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Apr-2010
item.description: On this festive occasion, Yell at Birds come by to chat and Wee Boy Pretty come by to play live!
item.itunes:subtitle: An Easter Special with Yell at Birds and Wee Boy Pretty

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Mar-2010
item.itunes:subtitle: The Noise Special With Whip of the UFO

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Mar-2010
item.itunes:subtitle: Mud Dog Performs live and Ruskin returns!

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Feb-2010
item.itunes:subtitle: Featuring Fred Penner and Liam Cromier of the Cancer Bats!

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Feb-2010
item.description: On this edition, we chat via telephone with Bobby Birdman before he comes to town to do a show at the Biltmore. Also, we reenact a Cathy comic on the air! What will we think of next?
item.itunes:subtitle: Let's get fun with Bobby Birdman!

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Jan-2010
item.description: Eldon Letkeman, ace director of the current local stage production of "Around the World in 80 Days" stops by to talk all things theatrical, and nerdical, also featuring a tonne of radio theatre from now and then, here and there.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Theatre Special with Around the World in 80 Days

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Jan-2010
item.description: The first show of 2010 rings in the new year with classy about town band Pompoir!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Start of a new Year with Pompoir!

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Dec-2009
item.description: Who doesn't love a clip show?!
item.itunes:subtitle: Best of 2009 Special!

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Dec-2009
item.description:
It's like that Muppet Xmas special where everyone comes together to celebrate each other's company.
This edition features a live acoustic set from the Autumn Portrait, and a live full-on set from the Patience Product, as well as emcee T-Train and the ever festive Bodhi Jones in attendance!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Holiday Special feat. Patience Product, Autumn Portrait, T-Train, and even Bodhi Jones!

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Nov-2009
item.description: CJ Wallis and JP Lancaster bring one new mastered track each from their forthcoming albums!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Reunion Special with Elective and Cairo

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Nov-2009
item.description: I, along with Evan and Irene, two sound engineers on loan from Thunderbird Radio Hell, attempt to raise some funds in the good name of independent radio featuring an interview with the Shomberg Fair, and a live performance with ska band Whitey!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Fundrive Edition with Whitey and Shomberg Fair!

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Nov-2009
item.description: The members of 7's 9's and 10's stop by to chat and play a set. Also, episode 2 of "Animal E.R."
item.itunes:subtitle: 7's 9's and 10's

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Oct-2009
item.description:
JP of our city's Cairo stopped by to chat casually for the show about everything from Hallowe'en costumes to James Cameron films.
Also, we had a quick and easy chat with Justin Beach of the North By East West blog about his current faves of Canadian indie music.
And then, we premiered the first episode of our ongoing drama "Aninmal E.R."
item.itunes:subtitle: Let's get to know Cairo! Also, a candid moment with North By East West, and Episode 1 of "Animal E.R."

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Oct-2009
item.description: A little bit of dance, a little bit of HARDCORE!
item.itunes:subtitle: Let's get to know Jakartah!

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Sep-2009
item.description: Twice the insanity, twice the analog hiss!
item.itunes:subtitle: Adjecive and Twin Crystals

item.description: A 'Round o' Fun with Katastroyka, two guys from the Rio Theatre, Pretty Vanilla, and Bodhi Jones!
